title: Sit Back, Relax. Your New View Awaits. Harbor Crest. Euclid.
app_fee: $35 app fee per adult-credit, rental history, and criminal background check
posting_body: ['SECURE YOUR APARTMENT BEFORE THE RATES INCREASE ON 4/1/22!!!', 'Harbor Crest is lakeside living at its best!', 'This beautiful apartment community in Euclid is the place to be.', 'Wake up to spectacular views of gorgeous sunrises and say good night to brilliant sunsets over Lake Erie.', 'Secure your 11th floor studio today!', 'Along with an amazing list of community amenities, we also offer the added convenience of online rental payment and maintenance requests.', 'Visit Harbor Crest at and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for!', 'Community Amenities:', '• Brand New State-of-the- Art Fitness Center', '• Sparkling Outdoor Pool', '• Heated Indoor Pool', '• Two Party Rooms', '• All New Common Area Upgrades Including Carpeting and Lighting', '• Laundry Facility in Each Building', '• Customer Service Office Offering Package Acceptance, Fax and Copy Machines', '• Underground Garage Parking Available', '• Near Public Transportation', '• Easy Access to Local Freeways', '• On-Site Management', '• On-Site Maintenance', '• Controlled Building Access', '• 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '• Online Rental Payments and Maintenance Requests', '• Preferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats - 2 allowed, Rent $20.00, Deposit $300.00', '• Comments: Rent is per cat.', 'Deposit is non-refundable.', 'Must be spayed or neutered.', 'It only takes 2 minutes!', 'Go to <URL> to see what Harbor Crest has to offer, please call', 'show contact info', 'today if you have any questions or to schedule an appointment.']
